Additionally, the bus's size might hide other road users from view and its frequent stops could impact the flow of traffic.

Additionally, yellow guardrails are present on both sides of the multi-lane road. These barriers are likely installed for traffic control and safety purposes, delineating the roadway and restricting vehicle movement to the designated road.
